item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

K I think I understand what your saying.

Client notepad>Search makeglobalobject>
Add the objects in there
the code is something like this i believe

     makeglobalobject(@@@@, ####, $$$$, %, 10);

@=X cord
#=Y cord
$=Object ID
%=Position of object theres -2,-1, 0,1

Just find like “Wilderness sign” object id then make them into a little box around the area you want.
This does take some time

If you want to make a safe area Wild then go to
client notepad>search

public boolean nonWild

Find the cords of the safe area and remove from list
ALL CORDS THAT ARE NOT IN THIS ARREE WILD!

  || (absX >= @@@@ && absX <= #### && absY >= @@@@ && absY <= ####)

this code is set up like this

@=One X,Y cord
#=Another X,Y cord

Read full topic
